original_title: Musulmans d'Europe, Chrétiens d'Orient: Miroirs Brisés
overview: From Muslims in Bosnia-Herzegovina to Christians in Lebanon, from the Bektashis of Macedonia to the Syriacs of Turkey, director Jacques Debs helps us discover two groups of people long forgotten or ignored - the Muslims in Europe and the Christians in the Middle East.
title: European Muslims and Eastern Christians: Broken Mirrors
